title: Sportscast - October 5, 2015
text:
Sports » Sports Featured » Sportscast - October 5, 2015 Sports Featured 
Updated: Mon, Oct 05 2015, 11:06 PM 
The full sportscast from the Fox 28 News at 9 on Monday, October 5th. Related Stories   Ed Thomas Coach of the Week Faith, Family, Football. Words of Inspiration from the Coach Ed Thomas Foundation. CBS 2 and FOX 28 in partnership with the Eastern Iowa Airport are looking for coaches who embody the spirit of Coach Thomas by having a strong impact on the community and on the sidelines. SEX TIPS-UNIVERSITY 
MADISON, Wis. (AP) -- How to satisfy a woman isn't the sort of lesson a dorm director should be teaching. Business News 
Major business and economic events scheduled for Tuesday: 
WASHINGTON (AP) -- A day after the Obama administration struck a trade deal with 11 other Pacific Rim countries, the Commerce Department releases international trade data for August. Science/Tech News 
IN THE NEWS: SPORTS BETTING SITES INVESTIGATED 
LAS VEGAS (AP) -- You've probably seen the ads; they are all over channels that broadcast sporting events: places where you can win money by playing fantasy teams.
